Name: Beholder Shock III
Desc:
The Beholder screams to bind nearby enemies and inflict damage on them. The Beholder shoots condensed Dark Aura to inflict extra damages on the enemies.
Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Required Skill: Beholder Shock II Lv. 20 or higher

H.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 630% Damage 7 times, with 90% chance of Binding them for 5 sec.
Shoots Darkness Aura x4 synchronously with attack to deliver 5 extra attacks against up to 3 enemies at 423% Damage.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
H.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 630% Damage 7 times, with a 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec. on hit.
Shoots 4 Darkness Auras synchronously with attack to deliver 5 extra attacks against up to 3 enemies at 423% Damage.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
